overview: Mr. Kitchen co-founded uControl and is responsible for product strategy. Most recently, he was at Motive and served in several capacities; Director of Product Marketing and Product Management responsible for Motive’s premier next-generation products in IPTV and VoIP, and prior to that as Senior Director of Motive’s Consulting Services Communications Practice running a team of about 60 consultants and supporting personnel. He was responsible for 200+ deployments to the largest service providers in the world. Prior to Motive, Mr. Kitchen was the President of a successful entertainment and marketing software consulting company in Los Angeles, California. Mr. Kitchen began his career by launching one of the first web-based services to offer real-time financial and news information where he served as Vice President of Software Development, Mr. Kitchen attended the University of Texas.
